snippet: The escape of a shoplifting suspect from a police vehicle on Thursday was criticized by the police commissioner as reflecting “a significant neglect of duty.”
abstract: Shoplifting suspect Magsayo Cruz escapes from police cruiser in Manhattan after feigning illness and disappears into subway, only to be arrested in Brooklyn several hours later; incident renews criticism of Mayor Bill de Blasio and Police Commissioner William J Bratton over string of suspect escapes while in police custody.
lead_paragraph: The escape of a shoplifting suspect from a police vehicle on Thursday was criticized by the police commissioner as reflecting “a significant neglect of duty.”

headline.main: Latest Escape From New York Police Custody Draws Ire, but No Rethinking of Training
headline.print_headline: Latest Escape From Police Custody Draws Ire, but No Rethinking of Training
